bundle.shortDescription: Modern GUI for Apple Container CLI with Image Marketplace
bundle.longDescription: A modern, intuitive desktop application for managing Apple's container CLI with a comprehensive Image Marketplace. Features include container lifecycle management, Docker Hub integration, real-time image discovery, one-click pulls, persistent state management, real-time logs, and system control. Browse 16+ featured images, search Docker Hub registry, and manage downloads with advanced progress tracking.
